gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides a configuration for coreference resolution. A configuration consists of a list of Strategy objects, each of which indicates a specific resolution strategy to use for a coreference mention/relation type pair. A default configuration can also be used.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int RESOLUTION_WINDOW_ALL
      Entire document as the resolution window
      static int RESOLUTION_WINDOW_SECTION
      Entire section as the resolution window
      static int RESOLUTION_WINDOW_SENTENCE
      Current sentence as the resolution window

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Configuration getInstance()
        Gets the existing configuration instance, or creates a default instance if no configuration exists.
        Returns:
        the Configuration singleton

      • getInstance

        public static Configuration getInstance(java.util.List<Strategy> strategies)
        Gets the existing configuration instance, or creates an instance with the provided list of strategies if no configuration exists.
        Parameters:
        strategies - the list of strategies to use
        Returns:
        the Configuration singleton

      • loadDefaultStrategies

        public static java.util.List<Strategy> loadDefaultStrategies()
        Loads the default resolution strategies.

        The default strategy handles Anaphora and Cataphora instances.

        Returns:
        the list of default strategies.

      • hasCorefType

        public boolean hasCorefType(CoreferenceType type)
        Checks whether the coreference resolution system is configured to handle a specific coreference type.
        Parameters:
        type - the coreference type in question
        Returns:
        true if the system can handle the coreference type type

      • hasExpType

        public boolean hasExpType(ExpressionType type)
        Checks whether the coreference resolution system is configured to handle a specific mention type.
        Parameters:
        type - the mention type in question
        Returns:
        true if the system can handle the mention type type

      • getStrategy

        public Strategy getStrategy(CoreferenceType corefType,
                            ExpressionType expType)
        Finds the appropriate strategy to apply for a given mention and coreference type.
        Parameters:
        corefType - the coreference type
        expType - the mention type
        Returns:
        the Strategy object that is applicable for the given input parameters, or null if no such strategy exists
